name: touchportal_advancedhold
description: Hold A button for X length, and increment state while being held every X <timeframe>

scripts.build-win:win32: pkg --targets node14-win-x64 . && move touchportal_advancedhold.exe base/Windows/TPAdvancedHold/ && del Installers\TPAdvancedHold-Win.tpp && cd base\Windows && 7z a -tzip ../../Installers/TPAdvancedHold-Win.tpp TPAdvancedHold && del TPAdvancedHold\touchportal_advancedhold.exe
scripts.build-win:linux:darwin: pkg --targets node14-win-x64 . && mv touchportal_advancedhold.exe base/Windows/TPAdvancedHold/ && rm -rf Installers/TPAdvancedHold-Win.tpp && cd base/Windows && zip -r ../../Installers/TPAdvancedHold-Win.tpp TPAdvancedHold && rm -rf TPAdvancedHold/touchportal_advancedhold.exe
scripts.build-mac:win32: pkg --targets node14-macos-x64 . && move touchportal_advancedhold base/Mac/TPAdvancedHold/ && del Installers\TPAdvancedHold-Mac.tpp && cd base\Mac && 7z a -tzip ../../Installers/TPAdvancedHold-Mac.tpp TPAdvancedHold && del TPAdvancedHold\touchportal_advancedhold
scripts.build-mac:linux:darwin: pkg --targets node14-macos-x64 . && mv touchportal_advancedhold base/Mac/TPAdvancedHold/ && rm -rf Installers/TPAdvancedHold-Mac.tpp && cd base/Mac && zip -r ../../Installers/TPAdvancedHold-Mac.tpp TPAdvancedHold && rm -rf TPAdvancedHold/touchportal_advancedhold

author: Jameson Allen aka Spdermn02
